name: Vehicular Homocide
description:
Run over pedestrians to score points. Don't let the police helicopter catch you. Drive fast, the chopper gains speed over time!

Controls:
W - accelerate
S - decelerate / reverse
A - turn left
D - turn right
Mouse - Menu UI

This game was made for Trijam #56. Theme: Evil is more fun.
Development process took between 5 and 6 hours, so the game unfortunately does not qualify in the jam's competition.

Any feedback or thoughts in the comments is very appreciated. Or just the highest score you managed to hit. Cheers.
